DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study randomize patient insomnia coronary heart disease either general sleep hygiene counsel web-based cognitive behavioral therapy insomnia versus general sleep hygiene counsel alone ( followed cognitive behavioral therapy later date ) .
DOC.detailed_description: For pilot study , investigator recruit 30 participant insomnia coronary heart disease . Another 30 patient recruit another institution . Patients screen modified version Insomnia Severity Index ( ISI ) , brief self-report instrument validate identify insomnia . The investigator modify ISI include exclusionary criterion . The investigator randomize participant 6 week access web base cognitive behavioral therapy insomnia ( wCBT-I ) use internet base CBT-I program plus education provide access Harvard Sleep Education web site ( provide general sleep education information ) compare 6 week access Harvard Sleep Education web site , follow access web-CBT program ( wait list control group ) . The investigator test hypothesis use wCBT-I improves sleep quality sleep duration measure sleep diary ISI . A secondary goal study assess recruitment yield , retention adherence rate .
